biotools.summary: A bioinformatics software for the Ruby programming language.  The toolkit contains a set of free development tools and libraries for bioinformatics and biology. BioRuby has components for sequence analysis, pathway analysis, protein modelling and phylogenetic analysis; it supports many widely used data formats and provides easy access to databases, external programs and public web services, including BLAST, KEGG, GenBank, MEDLINE and GO.

bioschemas.name: BioRuby
